name: Mayhem Tank War: 8 Player
description:
8 players on one iPad? They said it was not possible, we proved them wrong.

Mayhem Tank battles lets you take command of an amazing tank, and fight battles against up to 7 of your friends, or enemies.

Navigate 3 different battle terrains.
Play with up to 7 others, on one iPad.
Hey, what more do you want?
